attributes.action: impose "Jacket Potato Thursdays" on the public as a weekly national holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every Thursday, the public would profit HUGELY from taking the time to eat a well-cooked jacket potato. Not only is it a means to healthy nourishment and daily vitality, but given a good topping such as cheesy beans, tuna and sweetcorn, chilli or coleslaw, or even chocolate if you're feeling naughty, give a great uplifting "good mood food" for any time of the day. We intend to share this with you, the British public. Join in our celebration of this national treasure, the great jacket spud.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
